title: Ep. 313: Cindy Crawford Opens Up About Aging, The Supermodel Era, and More
itunes:title: Ep. 313: Cindy Crawford Opens Up About Aging, The Supermodel Era, and More
itunes:subtitle: Model Cindy Crawford is refreshingly honest about her “age maintenance” and what it’s like to model at 55 during this wide-ranging interview. She shares stories from the set of MTV’s House of Style, explains why she’ll never be able to do makeup as wel...
description:
Model Cindy Crawford is refreshingly honest about her “age maintenance” and what it’s like to model at 55 during this wide-ranging interview. She shares stories from the set of MTV’s House of Style, explains why she’ll never be able to do makeup as well as Naomi Campbell, and reveals what she said to her daughter, Kaia Gerber, before they walked the Versace runway together. Plus: the real reason she started Meaningful Beauty (her skincare brand, which just expanded with a new haircare range), the makeup products she can’t live without, why she wears bespoke perfume, and the reason she puts lemon on her sushi. -- Become a Fat Mascara+ member to listen to the podcast without ads: fatmascara.com/member; Episode recap & list of products featured: fatmascara.com/blog; To shop the products: myshlf.us/fatmascara; Our private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To submit a "Raise A Wand" product recommendation & be featured on a future episode: +1 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
